juzs.text: My ne poslaly vnyz na yoho lyudey, pislya yoho, soldativ z neba; my ne potrebuvaly poslaty yim vnyz
Vse tse vzyalo odyn udar, whereupon vony stilled
Yak zasmuchenyy yavlyaye soboyu umovu lyudey! Kozhnyy chas kur'yer poyikhav yim, vony zavzhdy ridiculed yo
vony ne dyvylysya skilʹky heneratsiy my vynyshchyly pered tym, yak yim, ta yak vony nikoly ne povernuly yim
Kozhnyy odyn z nykh budutʹ sklykatysya pered tym, yak ny
odyn znak dlya nykh yavlyaye soboyu mertvu zemlyu: my vidnovlyuyemo tse ta produktsiyu z tse zerna dlya yikhnʹoho prodovolʹstva
My rostemo u tse park palʹm daty, ta vynohrad, ta my vyklykayemo pruzhyny khlynuty tam
Tse musytʹ zabezpechyty yikh z fruktamy, ta shchob dozvolyty yim vyroblyayutʹ z yikhnimy vlasnymy rukamy shchob ni vony potrebuyutʹ. Vony by buly vdyachni
Slava musytʹ khto utvoryv vsi riznovydy zavodiv z zemli, tak zhe, yak i sebe, ta inshi stvorennya shcho vony ne navitʹ znayutʹ
Inshyy znak dlya nykh yavlyaye soboyu nich: my usuyemo daylight zvidty, whereupon vony ye u temryavi
komplekty sontsya u spetsyfichne roztashuvannya, z·hidno z proektom Mohutnʹoho, Omniscient
misyatsʹ my zamyslyly z'yavytysya u étapiv, do tse staye lyublyatʹ staryy vyhnutyy sheath
sontse nikoly ne spiymaty z misyatsem - nich ta denʹ nikoly deviate - kozhnyy z nykh plavaye u yoho vlasniy orbiti
Inshyy znak dlya nykh shcho my perevezly yikhnikh predkiv na navantazhenykh ark
Todi my stvoryuvaly ti zhe dlya nykh shchob yikhaty
Yakshcho my willed, my mohly potopyly yikh, tak shcho yikh by ne krych pochuti, ne mohly vony budutʹ vryatovani
Zamistʹ tsʹoho, my yim zlyvy z myloserdyam, ta dozvolyayutʹ yim polyublyayutʹ dlya deyakoho chasu
Dosi, koly vony rozpovidayutʹsya, "Doviduyutʹsya z vashoho mynulyy, shchob popratsyuvaty righteousness dlya vashoho maybutnʹoho, shcho vy mozhete dosyahnuty myloserdya
Niyaka materiya yakyy riznovyd dokazu dayetʹsya yim z yikhnʹoho Lorda, vony stiyko disregard tse

Koly vony rozpovidayutʹsya, 'Dayutʹ z BOZHYKH umov vam,' tsey khto disbelieve skazhete tsym khto vvazhayutʹ, 'Chomu musytʹ my dayemo tsʹomu komu BOHU mohly zhyvlennya, yakshcho Vin tak willed? Vy diysno daleko astray
Vony takozh skladna zadacha, "Koly shcho obitsyanka bude prybuvaty do propusku, yakshcho vy budete ye pravdyvi
Vsi vony dyvlyatʹsya budutʹ odyn udar shcho overwhelms yim, v toy chas, yak vony dysputuyutʹ
Vony ne budutʹ navitʹ maty chas zrobyty budutʹ, ne budutʹ vony vmiyutʹ povernutysya do yikhnikh lyudey
rih bude dutysya, whereupon vony budutʹ braty pochatok u seryoznyy ta budutʹ ity do yikhnʹoho Lorda
Vony skazhutʹ, "Prykroshchi do nas. Khto resurrected ny z nashoyi smerti? Tse ye shcho naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyve poobitsyalo. Kur'yery pravo
Vse tse vizʹme odyn udar, whereupon vony sklykayutʹsya pered tym, yak ny
Na shcho denʹ, niyaka dusha ne bude obrazhatysya u naymenshyy. Vam budete platytysya akuratno dlya shchob ni vy
dwellers Rayu bude, na shcho denʹ, happily zaynyatyy
Vony perebuyutʹ z yikhnim podruzhzhyam u krasyviy tini, polyublyayuchy zruchne vbrannya
Vony budutʹ maty frukty tam; vony budutʹ maty budʹ shcho vony bazhayutʹ
Pryvitannya myru z duzhe Myloserdnoho Lorda
Yak dlya vas, O vynuvati, vy budete vidkladatysya
I ne domovlenistʹ z vamy, O Dity Adam, shcho vy ne budete obozhnyuvaly chorta? Shcho vin vash naybilʹsh revnyy voroh
Ta shcho vy budete obozhnyuvaty Meni yedynyy? Tse yavlyaye soboyu pravo shlyakh
Vin pryzviv do pomylky bezlich vas. Vy ne ovolodily budʹ-yakym rozuminnyam
Tse yavlyaye soboyu Peklo tse bulo poobitsyane dlya vas
Sʹohodni vy spalyte u tse, yak naslidku vashoho disbelief
Na shcho denʹ my opechatayemo yikhni hyrla; yikhni ruky ta nohy budutʹ davaty svidchennya do vse vony zrobyly
Yakshcho my budemo, my mozhemo vualʹ yikhni ochi ta, otzhe, koly vony shukayutʹ shlyakhu, vony ne pobachatʹ
Yakshcho my budemo, my mozhemo zamerznuty yim na mistsi; otzhe, vony mozhutʹ ni zmina misʹtsya napered, ni idutʹ nazad
Whomever my dozvolyayemo prozhyty dovhyy chas, my perekhodymo yo do slabkosti. Vony ne rozumiyutʹ
Shcho my navchyly yoho (kur'yer) ne poeziya, ne vin (poet). Tse ale formidable dokaz, ta hlybokyy Quran
Shchob propoviduvaty do tsykh khto ye zhyvyy, ta expose disbelievers
vony ne pobachyly shcho my stvoryuvaly dlya nykh, z nashym volodiyemo ruky, domashna khudoba shcho vony volodiyutʹ
Ta my pidkoryly yikh dlya nykh; deyaki vony yidutʹ, ta deyaki vony hostyatʹsya
Vony oderzhuyutʹ inshyy maye vyhodu z nykh, tak zhe, yak i napoyu. Vony ne by buly appreciative
Vony zdiymayutʹsya bilya BOHA inshi bohy, mozhlyvo vony mozhutʹ buty dopomohy yim
Navpaky, vony ne mozhutʹ dopomohty yim; vony zakinchuyutʹ sluzhachykh yim yak prysvyachene soldatam
Tomu, ne budutʹ zasmuchenyy yikhnimy vyslovamy. My znayemo tsilkom vse vony prykhovuyutʹ ta vse vony zayavlyayutʹ
lyudsʹke isnuvannya ne dyvytʹsya shcho my utvoryly yoho z tiny krapli, todi vin povertaye u revnoho voroha
Vin pidnimaye pytannya do nas - toy chas, yak zabuvayuchy yoho vykhidne stvorennya - "Khto resurrect kistky pislya vony mozhutʹ hnyly
Kazhutʹ, khto zapochatkuvav yikh u pershu cherhu bude resurrect yim. Vin znaye tsilkom kozhne stvorennya
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto stvoryuye dlya vas, z zelenykh derev, palyvo kotryy vy horyte dlya svitla
ne khto utvoryuyetʹsya nebo ta zemlya spromozhna recreate ta zhe? Tak diysno; Vin yavlyaye soboyu Creator, Omniscient
Vesʹ Vin potrebuye zrobyty vykonaty budʹ-yaku komandu musytʹ skazaty tse,," ta tse
Tomu, slava musytʹ u chyyiy rutsi yavlyaye soboyu suverenitet nad vsima rechamy, ta yomu vy budete vertatysya
arrangers u kolonakh
blamers tsykh buty osudzhenyy
reciters povidomlenʹ
Vash boh tilʹky
Lord neba ta zemli, ta vse mizh nymy, ta Lordom skhodu
My prykrasyly naybilʹsh nyzʹki nebesa z prykrashayuchymy planetamy
My pylʹnuvaly tse z kozhnoho z·hubnoho chorta
Vony ne mozhutʹ rozvidnyk na Vysokomu Suspilʹstvi; vony pryyizhdzhayutʹ bombarded z kozhnoyi storony
Vony buly zasudzheni; vony zaznaly vichnoho retribution
Yakshcho budʹ-yaki yim pidpryyemstva zvynuvatyty zovnishni mezhi, vin pryyizhdzhaye ukladenyy z zhorstokyy projectile
Prosyatʹ yikh, vony bilʹshe tyazhki stvoryuyutʹ, abo inshi stvorennya?" My utvoryly yikh z volohoyi hryazyuky
V toy chas, yak vy awed, vony vysmiyuyutʹ
Koly nahadaly, vony ne berutʹ uvahu
Koly vony bachatʹ dokaz, vony ridicule tse
Yak kazhutʹ, "Tse ye ochevydno mahichne
Pislya my vmyrayemo ta stayemo pylom ta kistkamy, my pryyizhdzhayemo resurrected
Rivni nashi starovynni predky
Kazhete, "Tak, vy budete forcibly sklykatysya
Vse tse bere nudge, whereupon vony (vstayutʹ) dyvlyatʹsya
Vony skazhutʹ, "Prykroshchi do nas; tse yavlyaye soboyu Denʹ Vyroku
Tse yavlyaye soboyu denʹ rishennya shcho vy vykorystaly disbelieve
Sklykayutʹ porushnykiv, ta yikhnye podruzhzhya, ta idoly vony obozhnyuvaly
bilya BOHA, ta keruyutʹ nymy do shlyakhu Pekla
Zupynyayutʹ yikh, ta prosyatʹ yikh
Chomu vy ne dopomahayete odyn odnym
Vony budutʹ, na shcho denʹ, povnistyu podayuchyy
Vony prybudutʹ odyn odnoho, dopytuyuchy ta osudzhuyuchi odyn odnym
Vony skazhutʹ (do yikhnikh lideriv), "Vy zvychayno prybuvaly do nas z prava storona
Vony vidpovidutʹ, "Tse - vy shcho ne viruyuchi
My nikoly ne maly budʹ-yakyy enerhetychnyy nad vamy; tse - vy shcho buly bezputni
My spravedlyvo zaznaly nashoho vyroku Lorda; zaraz my povynni postrazhdaty
My pryzvely do pomylky vy, tilʹky tomu, shcho my astray
Otzhe, razom vony budutʹ vsi berutʹ uchastʹ retribution na tomu dni
Tse yak my requite vynuvati
Koly vony buly kazani, "Laa Elaaha Ella Allakh [Nemaye inshoho boha bilya BOHA]," vony povernulysya zukhvali
Vony skazaly, my 'Budemo lyshyty nashykh bohiv zarady bozhevilʹnoho poeta
Faktychno, vin prynis pravdu, ta pidtverdyv kur'yeriv
Naybilʹsh bezperechno, vy pokushtuyete naybilʹsh bolisnyy retribution
Vy requited tilʹky za shcho vy zrobyly
Tilʹky BOZHI sluzhbovtsi shcho absolyutno prysvyachuyutʹsya yomu vyklyuchno (budutʹ ryatuvatysya)
Vony zasluzhyly umovy shcho rezervuyutʹsya spetsialʹno dlya nykh
Vsi riznovydy fruktiv. Vony budutʹ shanuvatysya
U parku blazhenstva
Na vbranni blyzʹko do odyn odnym
Chashky chystykh napoyu budutʹ proponuvatysya yim
Yasnyy ta duzhe smachnyy dlya drinkers
Nikoly ne zabrudnyuvav, ta nikoly ne vysnazhenyy
Z nymy budutʹ dyvovyzhni kompanyony
Zakhyshchenyy lyublyatʹ lamki yaytse
Vony prybudutʹ odyn odnoho, ta prysudzhuyutʹ z odyn odnym
Odyn z nykh skazhu, "ya zvychayno mav tovarysha
Vin zvychayno vysmiyuvav: `do vy vvazhayete vse tse
after my vmyrayemo ta obih u pyl ta kistky, my pryyizhdzhayemo poklykani do vidpovidi
Vin skazhe, "Tilʹky berutʹ pohlyad
Koly vin dyvytʹsya, vin pobachytʹ yoho tovarysha u sertsi Pekla
Vin (poyide yomu ta) kazhete, BOHOM, vy mayzhe zruynuvaly meni
Yakshcho b tse bulo ne dlya moho Lorda blahoslovennya, ya by z vamy zaraz
(Robyte vas dosi vvazhayete) shcho my vmyrayemo
tilʹky persha smertʹ, ta my nikoly ne otrymuyemo budʹ-yakyy requital
Takyy yavlyaye soboyu naybilʹsh velykyy triumf
Tse ye shcho kozhnyy robitnyk musytʹ popratsyuvaty
tse krashcha dolya, abo derevo bitterness
My nadaly tse pokarannya dlya porushnykiv
Tse - derevo shcho roste u sertsi Pekla
Yoho kvity budutʹ skhozhi na chortamy holovy
Vony z'yidyatʹ z tse do yikhnikh shlunkiv zapovnyuyutʹsya
Todi vony budutʹ vershyna tse z hellish napoyim
Todi vony povernutʹsya do Didʹka
Vony znayshly yikhnikh batʹkiv astray
Ta vony slipo proslidkuvaly u yikhnikh krokakh
Bilʹshistʹ poperednikh heneratsiy zbylysya z shlyakhu u tomu zhe sposobi
My poslaly yim warners
Prymitka naslidky dlya tsykh khto buly poperedzhenyy
Tilʹky BOZHI sluzhbovtsi shcho absolyutno prysvyachuyutʹsya yomu vyklyuchno (ryatuyutʹsya)
Otzhe, Noah zaklykanyy na nas, ta my yavlyaly soboyu krashchyy responders
My vryatuvaly yoho ta yoho rodynu z velykoho lykha
My zrobyly yoho kompanyonam zhyvi
Ta my zberehly yoho istoriyu dlya nastupnykh heneratsiy
Myr budutʹ na Noah sered narodiv
My takym chynom nahorodzhuyemo spravedlyvyy
Vin ye odyn z nashoho viryachoho sluzhbovtsyam
My potonuly vsi inshi
Sered yoho poslidovnykiv Abraham
Vin prybuv do yoho Lorda wholeheartedly
Vin skazav yoho batʹkovi ta yoho lyudyam, "Yaki vy obozhnyuyete
tse tsi vyhotovleni bohy, zamistʹ BOHA, shcho vy zakhochete
Shcho vy dumayete Lorda vsesvitu
Vin podyvyvsya oberezhno u zirkakh
Todi vin vidmovyvsya vid ta skazav, "ya ye vtomlen tse
Vony prohnaly z yoho
Vin todi vklyuchyv yikhnikh idoliv, kazhuchy, "Chy ne mohly b vy lyubyty z'yisty
Chomu vy ne rozmovlyayete
Vin todi zruynuvav yikh
Vony poyikhaly yomu u velykyy rage
Vin skazav, "Yak vy mozhete obozhnyuvaty shcho vy vyrizayete
Koly BOH utvoryv vas, ta vse vy robyte
Vony skazaly, "Dozvolyayutʹ nam buduyutʹ velykyy vohonʹ, ta kydayutʹ yoho u tse
Vony zamyslyly proty yoho, ale my zrobyly yim losers
Vin skazav, "ya zbyrayusya miy Lord; Vin bude keruvaty meni
Miy Lord, harantuyutʹ meni spravedlyvi dity
My daly yomu harnu novynu harnoyi dytyny

Koly vin vyris dosytʹ popratsyuvaty z nym, vin skazav, "Miy syn, ya dyvlyusya u mriyi shcho ya zhertvuyu vamy. Shcho vy dumayete?" Vin skazav, "O miy batʹko, robyte shcho vy nakazuyetesʹ shchob zrobyty. Vy znaydete meni, BOH bazhayuchyy, patsiyent
Vony i podayutʹsya, i vin stavyv yoho cholo vnyz (shchob pozhertvuvaty yo)
My zaklykaly yoho: "O Abraham
Vy poviryly mriyi." My takym chynom nahorodzhuyemo spravedlyvyy
Shcho buv exacting test diysno
My ransomed (Ismail) zaminyayuchy tvarynu zhertvuyemo
Ta my zberehly yoho istoriyu dlya nastupnykh heneratsiy
Myr budutʹ na Abraham

My blahoslovyly yoho ta Isaac. Sered yikhnikh nashchadkiv, deyakykh spravedlyvi, ta deyakyy bezputni porushnyky

My zberehly yikhnyu istoriyu dlya nastupnykh heneratsiy

Ta nichchyu. Chy ne mohly b vy zrozumity

Yakshcho tse ne shcho vin vdavsya do mirkuvannya (na Bohu)
vin by zalyshyvsya u yoho shlunku do Dnya Resurrection

My maly derevo yistivnoho plodu vyroshchenoho dlya nʹoho
Todi my poslaly yomu do sta tysyachi, abo bilʹshe
Vony vvazhaly, ta my dozvolyayemo yim polyublyayemo tse zhyttya

my utvoryly anhely buty zhinky? Vony svidok shcho
Diysno, vony velyko blaspheme koly yak kazhutʹ
BOH begotten syn." Diysno, vony brekhuny
Vin vybrav divchyn nad khlopchykamy
Shcho nepravylʹnyy z vashoyu lohikoyu
Chomu vy ne berete uvahu
vy mayete budʹ-yakyy dokaz
Pokazuyete nam vashu knyhu, yakshcho vy ye pravdyvi
Vony navitʹ vynayshly spetsialʹne spivvidnoshennya mizh Yo ta jinns. jinns sebe znayutʹ shcho vony ye spryyatlyvi
BOH glorified; daleko nahori yikhniy vymahaye
Tilʹky BOZHI sluzhbovtsi shcho prysvyachuyutʹsya yomu vyklyuchno (ryatuyutʹsya)
Diysno, vy ta shcho vy obozhnyuyete
Ne mozhe nav'yazaty budʹ shcho na Yo
Tilʹky vy spalyte u Pekli
Kozhnyy odyn z nas maye spetsyfichnu robotu
My yavlyayemo soboyu arrangers

Vony zvychayno kazaly
Maly my otrymaly pravylʹni instruktsiyi z nashykh batʹkiv
my by worshipers; prysvyachenyy do BOHA yedynoho
Ale vony disbelieved, ta vony bezsumnivno znaydutʹ
Nashe rishennya vzhe ukhvalyuyetʹsya dlya nashykh sluzhbovtsiv kur'yery
Vony perekonuyutʹsya peremozhtsi
Nashi soldaty yavlyayutʹ soboyu peremozhtsiv
Tak disregard yim dlya deyakoho chasu
Sposterihayutʹ yikh; vony nadto budutʹ sposterihaty
vony vyklyk nash retribution
Koly yomu udaryaye yikh odyn denʹ, tse bude neshchasnyy denʹ; vony dostatno buly poperedzheni
Disregard yim dlya deyakoho chasu
Sposterihayutʹ yikh; vony nadto budutʹ sposterihaty
Slava musytʹ vash Lord, velykyy Lord; daleko nahori yikhniy vymahaye
Myr budutʹ na kur'yeriv
Pokhvala musytʹ BOH, Lord vsesvitu
(Saad), ta Quran shcho mistytʹ dokaz
Tsey khto disbelieve kynulysya v zukhvalistʹ ta porushennya
Bahato heneratsiyi pered tym, yak yim my vynyshchyly. Vony zaklykaly do dopomohu, marno
Vony dyvuvalysʹ shcho warner musyatʹ prybuty yim, z chysla yim. disbelievers skazav, charivnyk, brekhun
vin zrobyv boham u odnoho boha? Tse ye diysno nezvychayne
lidery oholosyly, "Idutʹ ta steadfastly persevere u obozhnyuyuchykh vashykh bohakh. Tse shcho bazhayetʹsya
My nikoly ne pochuly tse z relihiyi nashykh batʹka. Tse ye brekhnya
Chomu dokaz prybuv vnyz yomu, zamistʹ nas?" Diysno, vony ye doubtful Moho dokazu. Diysno, vony shche ne pokushtuvaly Miy retribution
Roblyatʹ vony volodiyutʹ skarbamy myloserdya vashoho Lorda, Mohutnʹoho, Nadavach subsydiyi
vony volodiyutʹ suverenitetom neba ta zemli, ta vse mizh nymy? Dozvolʹte yim dopomahayutʹ sebe
Zamistʹ tsʹoho, shchob ni prymushuye vony mozhutʹ ohlyad - navitʹ yakshcho vsi yikhni storony banded razom - budutʹ zavdavatysya porazky
Disbelieving pered tym, yak yim yavlyaly soboyu lyudey Noah, `aad, ta mohutni Pharaoh
Takozh, Thamoud, lyudy Doli, dwellers Lisiv (Midyan); tsey yavlyav soboyu oponentiv
Kozhnyy z nykh disbelieved kur'yery ta otzhe, Miy retribution buv nemynuchyy
Tsi lyudy mozhutʹ ochikuvaty yedynoho udaru, z kotroho vony nikoly ne vyduzhuyutʹ
Vony kynuly vyklyk: "Nash Lord, chomu robyte vas ne kydayetesya retribution dlya nas, pered Dnem Rozrakhunku
patsiyent pered yikhnimy vyslovamy, ta pam'yatayutʹ nashoho sluzhbovtsya David, vynakhidlyvyy; vin buv slukhnyanyy
My zdiysnyly hory u yoho sluzhbi, glorifying z nym nich ta denʹ
Takozh ptakhy buly zdiysneni shchob sluzhyty yomu; vesʹ slukhnyanyy yomu
My posylyly yoho tsaryuvannya, ta nadaly pravo yomu z wisdom ta harna lohika
vy otrymaly novynu feuding lyudy shcho pidkralysya u yoho sanctuary

Koly vony vnesly yoho prymishchennya, vin buv perelyakanyy. Vony skazaly, "Ne mayutʹ strakha. My feuding z odyn odnym, ta my shukayemo vashoho spravedlyvoho vyroku. Ne nepravylʹni ny, ta keruyutʹ namy u pravi shlyakh
Tsey brat shakhty volodiye dev'yanosta dev'yatʹma baranom, v toy chas, yak ya volodiyu odnym baranom. Vin zakhoche zmishaty moho barana z yoho, ta prodovzhuyetʹsya do tysku meni

Vin skazav, "Vin buty nespravedlyv do vas prosyachy shchob ob'yednaty vashoho barana z yoho. Naybilʹsh lyudy kotri ob'yednuyutʹ yikhni vlasnistʹ stavlyatʹsya odyn odnoho nespravedlyvo, krim tsykh khto vvazhayutʹ ta robota righteousness, ta tsey tak." Piznishe, David dyvuvavsya yakshcho vin zrobyv pravo vyrok. Vin podumav shcho my vyprobovuvaly yoho. Vin todi blahav yoho Lorda dlya forgiveness, uklonyvsya vnyz, ta kayavsya
My prostyly yoho u tsiy materiyi. My harantuvaly yomu pozytsiyu chesti z namy, ta krasyvoyi abode

O David, my zrobyly vam liniyku na zemli. Tomu, vy budete pryymaty rishennya sered lyudey equitably, ta ne sliduyete za vashoyu personalʹnoyu dumkoyu, lest tse vidvodytʹ vas z shlyakhu BOHA. Bezsumnivno, tsey khto zbyvayutʹsya z shlyakhu shlyakh BOHA zaznayutʹ suvoroho retribution dlya toho, shchob zabuvaty Denʹ Rozrakhunku
My ne utvoryly nebesa ta zemlyu, ta vse mizh nymy, marno. Takyy yavlyaye soboyu myslennya tsykh khto disbelieve. Tomu, prykroshchi do tsykh khto disbelieve; vony postrazhdayutʹ u Pekli

my Budemo obrobyty tsi khto vvazhayutʹ ta Bude pryvesty spravedlyve zhyttya tomu shcho my obroblyayemo tsi khto zdiysnyuyutʹ zlo na zemli? My budemo obrobyty spravedlyvyy tomu shcho my stavymosʹ bezputnyy
Tse ye svyate pysannya shcho my poslaly vnyz do vas, shcho vmiye svyashchenni mozhlyvo vony viddzerkalyuyutʹ na yoho virshakh. Tsey khto volodiyutʹ rozvidkoyu vizʹme uvahu
David my harantuvaly Solomon; harnyy ta slukhnyanyy sluzhbovetsʹ
odyn denʹ vin stav preoccupied z krasyvymy kinʹmy, do nochi vpav
Vin todi skazav, "ya otrymav nasolodu vid materialʹnykh rechey bilʹsh nizh ya otrymav nasolodu vid obozhnyuyuchoho moho Lorda, do sontsya znyk
Prynosyatʹ yim nazad." (Shchob braty uchastʹ u torhakh proshchannya,) vin styrav yikhni nohy ta shyyi
My takym chynom stavymo Solomon do testu; my blahoslovlyaly yoho z prostorym materialʹnym bahat·stvom, ale vin steadfastly pidkoryvsya
Vin skazav, "Miy Lord, probachayutʹ meni, ta harantuyutʹ meni tsaryuvannya nikoly ne dosyahnute budʹ khto shche. Vy yavlyayete soboyu Nadavacha subsydiyi
My (vidpovidaly yoho molytvu ta) zdiysnyuvav viter u yoho rozporyadzhenni, llyuchomu doshchi de zavhodno vin zakhotiv
Ta chorty, budynok ta pirnannya
Inshi buly rozmishcheni u yoho rozporyadzhenni
Tse ye nashe zabezpechennya do vas; vy mozhete daty velykodushno, abo mozhete utrymaty, bez mezh
Vin zasluzhyv pochesnu pozytsiyu z namy, ta dyvovyzhnu abode
Pam'yatayutʹ nashu Robotu sluzhbovtsya: vin zaklykav na yoho Lorda, chort afflicted meni z neharazdamy ta bolem
Straykuyutʹ zemlya z vashoyu nohoyu. Vesna dastʹ vam likuyuchyy ta napiy
My restavruvaly yoho rodynu dlya nʹoho; dvichi yak bahato. Takyy nashe myloserdya; reminder dlya tsykh khto volodiyutʹ rozvidkoyu
Zaraz, vy budete mandruvaty zemlya ta bude propoviduvaty povidomlennya, fulfill vasha zastava." My znayshly yoho steadfast. Shcho harnyy sluzhbovetsʹ! Vin buv submitter
Pam'yatayutʹ takozh nashykh sluzhbovtsiv Abraham, Isaac, ta Jacob. Vony buly vynakhidlyvi, ta ovolodily zorom
My podaruvaly yikh velyke blahoslovennya: obiznanistʹ U maybutnʹomu
Vony buly vybrani, dlya vony buly sered naybilʹshoho spravedlyvyy
Zapam'yatayutʹ Ismail, Elisha, ta Zal-Kifl; sered naybilʹshoho spravedlyvyy
Tse ye reminder: spravedlyvyy zasluzhyly dyvovyzhnu dolyu
park Eden vidkryye yikhni bramy dlya nykh
Rozslablyayutʹsya tam, vony budutʹ davatysya bahato riznovydiv fruktiv ta napoyu
Vony budutʹ maty dyvovyzhne podruzhzhya
Tse ye yaki vy zasluzhyly na Dni Rozrakhunku
Nashi umovy inexhaustible
Yak dlya porushnykiv, vony zaznaly neshchasnoyi doli
Peklo de vony horyatʹ; shcho neshchasnyy abode
Shcho vony kushtuyutʹ tam budutʹ hellish napiy ta hirke prodovolʹstvo
Ta bahato bilʹshe toho zhe riznovydu
Tse ye hrupa buty kyneno u Peklo z vamy." Vony ne budutʹ pryvitani (meshkantsyamy Pekla). Vony zasluzhyly spalyty u hellfire
newcomers vidpovidete, "Ne vy vitaly. Vy yavlyayete soboyu kotri pereduvaly nam ta pryzvely do pomylky ny. Tomu, zaznayutʹ tsʹoho neshchasnoho kintsya
Vony takozh skazhutʹ, "Nash Lord, tsey yavlyayutʹ soboyu kotri pryviv nas u tse; podvoyte retribution hellfire dlya nykh
Vony skazhutʹ, "Yak prybuvayutʹ my ne dyvymosʹ (u Pekli) lyudy my zvychayno rakhuvaly sered bezputnyy
My vykorystaly ridicule yim; my zvychayno povertaly nashi ochi daleko z nykh
Tse ye predetermined fakt: lyudy Pekla budutʹ tryvala vorozhnecha z odyn odnym
Kazhu, "ya poperedzhayu vas; nemaye inshoho boha bilya BOHA,, Vyshchoho

ya nadykhayusʹ shcho moya yedyna misiya musytʹ dostavyty poperedzhennya do vas

Odnoho "razu ya proekt yo, ta udar u yoho z Moho dukh, vy budete vpasty prostrate pered tym, yak yo

Vin skazav, "ya krashche nizh vin; Vy stvoryuvaly meni z vohnyu, ta utvoryly yoho z hlyny

Vy zaznaly Moho osudu do Dnya Vyroku

Do pryznachenoho dnya

Krim Vashoho worshipers khto prysvyachuyetesʹ absolyutno do Vas yedynykh
Vin skazav, "Tse yavlyaye soboyu pravdu, ta pravda ye vesʹ shcho ya vymovlyayu
ya zapovnyu Peklo z vamy ta vse tse khto sliduyutʹ za vamy
Kazhu, "ya ne proshu vas dlya budʹ-yakoyi zarplaty, ta ya ye ne samozvanetsʹ
Tse ye reminder dlya svitu
Ta vy zvychayno znaydete u deyakomu chasi
Tse ye vidkryttya svyatoho pysannya, z BOHA, Mohutnʹoho, Mudroho
My poslaly vnyz do vas tse svyate pysannya, pravdyvo; vy budete obozhnyuvaty BOHA, prysvyachuyuchy vashu relihiyu yomu yedynu

Absolyutno, relihiya povynna buty prysvyachena do BOHA yedynoho. Tsey khto vstanovlyuvaly idoliv bilya Yoho kazhemo, "My idolize yim tilʹky prynesty nam blyzhchym do BOHA; dlya vony ye u krashchiy pozytsiyi!" BOH bude sudyty yikh vidnosno yikhnikh superechok. BOH ne keruye takymy brekhunamy, disbelievers
Yakshcho BOH zakhotiv maty syna, Vin mih vybraly whomever Vin willed z chysla Yoho stvorennya. Vin glorified; Vin BOH,, Vyshchyy

Vin utvoryv nebo ta zemlyu pravdyvo. Vin z·hortaye nich nad dnem, ta z·hortaye denʹ nad nichchyu. Vin zdiysnyv sontse ta misyatsʹ, kozhnyy bihayuchyy dlya finite periodu. Absolyutno, Vin yavlyaye soboyu Mohutniy, Probachayuchyy

Vin utvoryv vas z odniyeyi osoby, todi stvoryuvaly z yoho yoho tovarysh. Vin poslav vnyz do vas visim riznovydiv domashnoyi khudoby. Vin utvoryuye vas u vashykh shlunkakh materiv, stvorenni pislya stvorennya, u trimesters temryavy. Takyy BOH vash Lord. Yomu nalezhytʹ vsʹomu suverenitetu. Nemaye inshoho boha bilya Yoho. Yak vy mohly deviate

Yakshcho vy disbelieve, BOH ne potrebuye budʹ khto. Ale Vin ne lyubytʹ shchob pobachyty Yoho sluzhbovtsiv pryymayutʹ nepravylʹne rishennya. Yakshcho vy vyrishyte oderzhuvaty appreciative, Vin musytʹ dlya vas. Niyaka dusha ne nosytʹ hrikhy budʹ-yakoyi inshoyi dushi. Ostatochno, do vashoho Lorda ye vashe vidshkoduvannya, todi Vin poinformuye vas vse vy zrobyly. Vin znaye tsilkom nayhlybshi dumky

Koly lyudsʹke isnuvannya afflicted, vin blahaye yoho Lorda, vidverto viddanyy yomu. Ale yak tilʹky Vin blahoslovlyaye yoho, vin zabuvaye yoho poperedniy blahayuchyy, vstanovlyuye idoliv vyshykuvatysya z BOHOM ta shchob vidvesty inshi z Yoho shlyakhu. Skazhitʹ, "Polyublyayutʹ vash disbelief tymchasovo; vy pidpaly hellfire

tse ne krashche odne z tsykh khto rozdumuyutʹ u nochi, prostrating ta zalyshayetʹsya, znaye U maybutnʹomu, ta shukaye myloserdya yikhnʹoho Lorda? Skazhitʹ, tsey khto znayutʹ rivnyy do tsykh khto ne znayutʹ?" Tilʹky tsey khto volodiyutʹ rozvidkoyu vizʹme uvahu

Kazhutʹ, "O Moyi sluzhbovtsi shcho vvazhaly, vy budete povaha vash Lord." Dlya tsykh khto popratsyuvaly righteousness u tsʹomu sviti, harniy vynahorodi. BOZHA zemlya ye prostora, ta tsey khto steadfastly persevere otrymaye yikhnyu vynahorodu velykodushno, bez mezh
Kazhu, "ya buv nakazanyy shchob obozhnyuvaty BOHA, prysvyachuyuchy relihiyu absolyutno yomu yedynu
Ta ya buv nakazanyy shchob yavlyaty soboyu krayniy submitter
Kazhu, "ya bo, yakshcho ya ne pidkoryavsya moyomu Lordu, retribution velykoho dnya
Kazhu, "BOH yavlyaye soboyu tilʹky odyn ya obozhnyuyu, prysvyachuyuchy moyu relihiyu absolyutno yomu yedynu

Tomu, obozhnyuyete shchob ni vy bazhayete bilya Yoho." Skazhitʹ, realʹnyy losers ye tsey khto hublyatʹ yikhni dushi, ta yikhni sim'yi, na Dni Resurrection." Naybilʹsh zvychayno, tse yavlyaye soboyu realʹnu vtratu
Vony budutʹ maty bezlich vohnyu na vershyni z nykh, ta pid nymy. BOH takym chynom tryvoha Yoho sluzhbovtsi: O Moyi sluzhbovtsi, vy budete povaha Meni
Yak dlya tsykh khto discard obozhnyuyutʹ vsikh idoliv, ta prysvyachuyutʹ sebe povnistyu do BOHA vyklyuchno, vony zasluzhyly shchastya. Dayte harna novyna Moyim sluzhbovtsyam
Vony yavlyayutʹ soboyu khto vyvchayutʹ vsi slova, todi slidkuyutʹ krashchyy. Tsey yavlyayutʹ soboyu komu BOHA keruvav; tsey yavlyayutʹ soboyu khto volodiyutʹ rozvidkoyu
Shcho stosuyetʹsya tsykh khto zasluzhyly retribution, mozhe vy ryatuyete tsi khto ye vzhe u Pekli
Yak dlya tsiyeyi kotroyi povahy yikhniy Lord, vony budutʹ maty osobnyaky na osobnyaky zbudovani dlya nykh, z techuchymy potokamy. Tse ye BOZHA obitsyanka, ta BOH nikoly ne rozbyvaye Yoho obitsyanku

vy ne dyvytesʹ shcho BOH posylaye vnyz z neba voda, todi rozmishchuye tse u pidzemnyy wells, todi vyroblyaye z tse zavody riznomanitnykh kolʹoriv, todi vony rostutʹ do vony obih zhovtyy, todi Vin povertaye yikh u sino? Tse povynno buty reminder dlya tsykh khto volodiyutʹ rozvidkoyu

Yakshcho BOH nadaye vmist sertsya z Podannyam, vin bude sliduvaty za svitlom z yoho Lorda. Tomu, prykroshchi do tsykh chyyikh serdenʹok tverdiyutʹsya proty BOZHOHO povidomlennya; vony poyikhaly daleko astray

BOH vidkryv herein krashchyy Hadith; knyha shcho ye stiyka, ta svidchytʹ i shlyakhy (do Nebes i Pekla). Shkury tsiyeyi kotroyi povahy yikhniy Lord cringe zvidty, todi yikhni shkury ta yikhni serdenʹka pom'yakshuyutʹ dlya BOZHOHO povidomlennya. Takyy BOZHE kerivnytstvo; Vin daruye tse na whoever wills (shchob keruvatysya). Yak dlya tsykh poslanoho astray BOHOM, nichoho ne mozhe keruvaty nymy
Shcho krashche nizh ryatuye oblychchya z strashnoho retribution na Dni Resurrection? Porushnykam budutʹ rozpovidatysya, "Kushtuyutʹ naslidky yakykh vas zaroblenykh
Inshi pered tym, yak yim disbelieved ta, otzhe, retribution afflicted yim zvidky vony nikoly ne ochikuvani
BOH zasudyv yikh do prynyzhennya u tse zhyttya, ta retribution u U maybutnʹomu bude daleko hirshyy, yakshcho vony tilʹky znaly
My protsytuvaly dlya lyudey kozhnyy riznovyd prykladu u tse Quran, shcho vony mozhutʹ vzyaty uvahu
arabsʹkyy Quran, bez budʹ-yakoyi dvoznachnosti, shcho vony mozhutʹ buty spravedlyvi

BOH tsytuye pryklad lyudyny shcho maye spravu z dysputuyuchykh partneriv (Hadith), porivnyanyy do lyudyny shcho maye spravu z tilʹky odne stiyke dzherelo (Quran). Vony ti zhe? Pokhvalitʹ musytʹ BOH; bilʹshistʹ yikh ne znayutʹ
Vy (Muhammad) bezsumnivno vmrutʹ, tochno, yak vony vmrutʹ
Na Dni Resurrection, pered tym, yak vash Lord, vy lyudy budutʹ tryvala vorozhnecha z odyn odnym
